document_data.name: Krowen Valharrow
document_data.mainbody: '''Krowen Valharrow''' was an archmage member of the [[Harpers]] in [[Everlund]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities:
Krowen lived in [[Moongleam Tower]] with the company of dozens of [[tressym]] and a handful of apprentices. He offered to people that he liked to bequeath one (and only one) of his tressym.
 
Secretly Krowen managed a secret network of [[teleportation circle]]s that connected Everlund to [[Yartar]], [[Neverwinter]], [[Loudwater]], [[Mirabar]] and [[Waterdeep]].
